name: Talk_Joshua
_source: speak;Eirika;May I ask who you are?
speak;Joshua;The name is Joshua.|I'm looking for who is the leader of this gang of do-gooders.
speak;Joshua;It's fine, it's fine.|I'm not going to sell you out or anything.|I just have a nose for this kind of thing...
speak;Joshua;Just my luck though...|What in the world did I get myself into?...|I didn't want to get involved with royalty stuff...
speak;Joshua;Don't worry, I'll fight for you guys.|You've got some pretty women in your ranks, so it can't be that bad, right?
speak;Eirika;How are you holding up Joshua?
speak;Joshua;It's my first battle with you guys and I can hardly see a thing.|I suppose I've had worse though.
speak;Joshua;Let's just say I'm used to sandstorms obstructing my vision.
speak;Joshua;Just a little mercenary work back in the day.|Don't think about it too much.|Now if you will excuse me, I've got a tavern to find.
speak;Eirika;What are you doing on this mountain Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Just reading the wind a little bit...|I don't like how it is blowing...
speak;Joshua;Just a little bit.|Someone I know can do it better than I can.|She could tell when things would start to go south.
speak;Joshua;Talk about storming the castle, huh?
speak;Eirika;You seemed pretty comfortable fighting in the castle Joshua.
speak;Joshua;Eh, you've seen one castle, you've seen them all.
speak;Eirika;You've been in a castle before Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Yeah, more than I would've liked.|Doesn't matter though...|
speak;Joshua;Yeah...|Yeah, just need to get my mind off of things.
speak;Eirika;How does the armory look, Joshua?
speak;Joshua;There might be some good weapons here.|Doesn't really suit my style, but they aren't bad.|I've seen better though.
speak;Eirika;You do have a good eye for valuables, Joshua.
speak;Joshua;I've had my share of using the best and the worst.|That experience has helped me learn how to discern between the two.
speak;Eirika;That's good then.|I'll leave arming the troops to you then.
speak;Joshua;What, am I a war advisor now?
speak;Eirika;Were you going to gamble again Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Yeah, but this arena's been closed down too!|Where can a simple man like me go to earn a little coin?!
speak;Eirika;What do you even do with the money you make anyway?
speak;Joshua;That's for me to know and for others' wallets to never find out!
speak;Eirika;How can you sleep while standing up Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Hmmm?|Just close your eyes and stop thinking...|Not much else to it.
speak;Joshua;Yeah...|I like to feel the heat from the flames.
speak;Joshua;Oh yeah?|...I guess you could say that.
speak;Joshua;I guess this heat just reminds me of home...
speak;Eirika;That's quite a sharp look you've got there Joshua...
speak;Eirika;You come from the desert, don't you Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Yes...|I guess that's easy to figure out at this point, huh?
speak;Eirika;Yes...|Though, you're still a mystery to me.
speak;Joshua;Well, glad I have some mystery to me then.|I don't want to be an open book.
speak;Eirika;He he.|Oh Joshua.|...Are you afraid to go back to the desert?
speak;Joshua;No...|Not anymore...|I think it's about time I go back...|I need to face something...
speak;Eirika;We are here for you if you need us, Joshua.
speak;Eirika;Joshua, you look pale...|Are you ok?
speak;Joshua;...I'm fine.|We need to find Mo-, the Queen quick.
speak;Eirika;...Yes.|We need to find her quickly.|I'll let you know if we find anything.
speak;Joshua;I was such a fool...wasn't I?

speak;Eirika;...I know how you feel, Joshua...|I lost my father to this war too...|It pains me that I couldn't do anything to save him...|But I know my father wants me to move forward and save Renais.|The people are in need, and I want to protect them.|I know your mother would want the same for you.|Jehanna needs a righteous ruler.

speak;Joshua;"sigh".|I guess we've got a lot in common, don't we now?|You're right though, Mother wouldn't want me to mope around so much.|Jehanna needs a king.|A good one at that.|I guess it's time for me to step up.
speak;Eirika;Joshua, I know you can do it.|You are a strong man.
speak;Joshua;Thank you Eirika.|May Lady Luck bless us both.
speak;Eirika;Thank you for your strength, Joshua.|We finally got Renais back.
speak;Joshua;Anytime there, Eirika.|Looks like we are in the same boat now.|We both lost our kingdoms, and now we have to clean up the mess.
speak;Eirika;I suppose we are similar in that way...|Are you sure you should still be with us?|Shouldn't you be helping Jehanna?
speak;Joshua;The faster we end this war, the faster Jehanna can heal.|Plus, I've been gone for so many years.|They can wait just a little longer for my return.
speak;Joshua;Now this is rare.|I've never seen you this down before.
speak;Eirika;Joshua...|Forgive me, this has been a eventful day for me...
speak;Joshua;Let me bet.|That Lyon guy, right?|That's the prince of Grado, right?
speak;Eirika;Yes...|I just can't believe he is gone...|There must be something I can do...
speak;Joshua;I'm not good with royalty stuff, but I know how to handle a tough situation.|You don't have all the cards in your hand yet, right?|Don't fold yet until you've got a winning hand.
speak;Joshua;What I'm saying is, don't give up.|You're not dead yet and neither is he.|So don't look so down while you still have a chance to win.
speak;Eirika;Wow...|That was pretty inspiring Joshua...|You might make a good king afterall...
speak;Joshua;Hey now!|I'm not king yet!|We've still got a lot of business to take care of!
speak;Eirika;He he!|You're right, we still have work to do!|Thank you, Joshua.
speak;Eirika;I take it you're used the heat?
speak;Joshua;I take pride in my ability to withstand hot temperatures.|Though even I would say this is pretty hot.
speak;Eirika;That is understandable.|I don't think a normal person could live in heat like this.
speak;Joshua;Not a normal person, for sure.|Though I could think of a few people that might like enviroments like this.
speak;Eirika;I could think of some that would too...
speak;Joshua;I've had my fair share of sleepless nights.|A small nap would sound good about now.
speak;Eirika;You can take a break if you are tired.
speak;Joshua;Maybe I will, though I hate these castle beds.
speak;Eirika;Too comfy?|Are the beds in Jehanna better?
speak;Joshua;Much better.|My mother knew what beds were best for sleeping.|Not like these stuck up priests.
speak;Eirika;Joshua, are you ready for the final battle?
speak;Joshua;Yes, I'm ready to end this war.|I need to get back to Jehanna as soon as I can.
speak;Eirika;Ready to go back so soon?
speak;Joshua;What?|You trying to get me to change my mind after all of this?
speak;Eirika;No.|I'm just suprised how much you have changed.|You've become a mercenary to a king right before my eyes.
speak;Joshua;I guess that is quite the change to witness.|Just don't make a big deal of it in the history books.|They make those stories so boring, and stuffy.
speak;Eirika;Not one for the history books?|Though I do look forward to see how history paints you.
speak;Joshua;That part I'm not looking foward to.
speak;Ephraim;Hey you, the one with the hat.
speak;Joshua;You talking to me, fancy caped one?
speak;Ephraim;Yes, I'm trying to talk to all of my new troops.|I've heard from my sister that you were an intriguing one.
speak;Joshua;Ah, so your Eirika's brother.|I thought I noticed a resemblance.|So your another royal type, huh?
speak;Ephraim;Yes, I am a prince.|Though I try not to have that get in the way between me and my troops.|I understand that working together is what will bring us victory.
speak;Joshua;Your highly optimistic, just like your sister.|You really are family.
speak;Ephraim;I suppose we are similar in that sense.|Though don't always expect the same kindness as my sister.|I'm not afraid to strike with my lance if needs be.
speak;Joshua;Hey, that's something I can respect.|We just might get along then.|I like a prince that can bear his fangs.
speak;Ephraim;Good, I look forward to seeing what you can do then.
speak;Joshua;Just don't lag too behind me then.
speak;Ephraim;Joshua, I need a man to gather food supplies for the boat ride.|Can you do that?
speak;Joshua;No, I hate being on the ocean.|Too much swaying.|Can't even drink the water.|I would rather be on land.
speak;Ephraim;I can see where you're coming from.|Unfortunately, we have no other faster alternatives.
speak;Joshua;This is gonna be a long boat ride...
speak;Ephraim;How are you holding up, Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Please...|Don't talk to me right now...|It's hard enough to stand...as it is...|Ugh...
speak;Ephraim;Poor soul...|I've never seen someone look so pale before...
speak;Ephraim;Were you at the arena, Joshua?
speak;Joshua;Yes, but those blasted imbeciles closed down the arena due to the fighting!|Don't they know that's the best time to have arena matches?!
speak;Joshua;Yeah!|That's when your blood is boiling the most!|People are more likely to bet more money when they are like that!|I used to make a fortune that way!
speak;Ephraim;Eirika did say he had a major gambling problem.|I guess I took her word for granted.
speak;Joshua;Hey Ephraim.|You look unusually down.|Was it because that Selena woman?
speak;Ephraim;Yes, I just wish we could've convinced her to join us.

speak;Joshua;You can't let something like this get you down.|It was a fifty-fifty chance she would join you.|You may have lost your hand there, but you won the battle here.|Can't complain about the chips you end up with.
speak;Ephraim;I suppose you're right, Joshua.|We live to fight another day.
speak;Joshua;Another day, another bet.|Another chance to get a winning hand.
speak;Ephraim;You look uncomfortable, Joshua.|You don't like being in castles.
speak;Joshua;Castles aren't my forte...|Plus, I've got a bad feeling...|I don't know why, but I feel like something bad is going to happen soon...
speak;Joshua;Yeah, my instincts are telling me something is up.|Like I need to be somewhere.|Maybe it's just being back in a castle making me feel this way.
speak;Ephraim;You've been in a castle before?
speak;Joshua;...Yes.|A long time ago...|Far too long ago...
speak;Ephraim;Joshua.|You are the prince of Jehanna, aren't you?
speak;Joshua;I was such a fool...Wasn't I?

speak;Ephraim;...I know how you feel, Joshua.|I lost my father to this war too.|It pains me that I couldn't do anything to save him.|But I know my father wants me to move forward and save Renais.|The people are in need, and I want to protect them.|I know your mother would want the same for you.|Jehanna needs a righteous ruler.

speak;Joshua;"sigh".|I guess we've got a lot in common, don't we now?|You're right though, mother wouldn't want me to mope around so much.|Jehanna needs a king.|A good one at that.|I guess it's time for me to step up.
speak;Ephraim;Joshua, you can do it.|We have to, for our kingdoms.
speak;Joshua;Thank you, Ephraim.|Lady Luck bless us both.
speak;Ephraim;Thank you for your cooperation, Joshua.|We finally got Renais back.
speak;Joshua;No need for thanks, Ephraim.|Looks like we are in the same boat now.|We both lost our kingdoms, and now we have to clean up the mess.
speak;Ephraim;I suppose we are similar in that way.|Are you sure you should still be with us?|Shouldn't you be helping Jehanna?
speak;Joshua;The faster we end this war, the faster Jehanna can heal.|Plus, I've been gone for so many years.|They can wait just a little longer for my return.
speak;Ephraim;I see.|Well, let's try to end this war quickly then.
speak;Joshua;Now this is a sight.|I've never seen you this down before.
speak;Ephraim;Joshua.|Excuse me, this has been a eventful day for me.
speak;Joshua;Let me bet.|That Lyon guy, right?|That's the prince of Grado, right?
speak;Ephraim;Yes...|I can't believe things have gotten this bad...|I fail to think of a perfect solution.
speak;Joshua;I'm not good with royalty stuff, but I know how to handle a tough situation.|You don't have all the cards in your hand yet, right?|Don't fold yet until you've got a winning hand.
speak;Joshua;What I'm saying is, don't give up.|You're not dead yet.|So don't look so down while you still have a chance to win.
speak;Ephraim;Wow...|That was pretty inspiring Joshua.|You might make a good king afterall.
speak;Joshua;Hey now!|I'm not king yet!|We've still got a lot of business to take care of!
speak;Ephraim;You're right, we still have work to do.|Thanks, Joshua.
speak;Ephraim;I take it you're used the heat?
speak;Joshua;I take pride in my ability to withstand hot temperatures.|Though even I would say this is pretty hot.
speak;Ephraim;That is understandable.|I don't think a normal person could live in heat like this.
speak;Joshua;Not a normal person, for sure.|Though I could think of a few people that might like enviroments like this.
speak;Ephraim;I could think of some that would too...
speak;Joshua;I've had my fair share of sleepless nights.|A small nap would sound good about now.
speak;Ephraim;You can take a break if you are tired.
speak;Joshua;Maybe I will, though I hate these castle beds.
speak;Ephraim;Too comfy?|Are the beds in Jehanna better?
speak;Joshua;Much better.|My mother knew what beds were best for sleeping.|Not like these stuck up priests.
speak;Ephraim;Joshua, are you ready for the final battle?
speak;Joshua;Yes, I'm ready to end this war.|I need to get back to Jehanna as soon as I can.
speak;Ephraim;Ready to go back so soon?
speak;Joshua;What?|You trying to get me to change my mind after all of this?
speak;Ephraim;No.|I'm just suprised how much you have changed.|You've become a mercenary to a king right before my eyes.
speak;Joshua;I guess that is quite the change to witness.|Just don't make a big deal of it in the history books.|They make those stories so boring, and stuffy.
speak;Ephraim;Not one for the history books?|Though I do look forward to see how history paints you.
speak;Joshua;That part I'm not looking foward to.
